Author: swagzilla_xo
Text: personally I started with “hey can I talk to you about something”,  sat my bf down and said something along the lines of “I’ve struggled with disordered eating/an ed for a few years, it is a big part of my life and really takes a toll on me. I love and care about you so I wanted to let you know what’s going on”, also that he doesn’t need to “fix me” or anything and that im just letting him know both so I can be safe and he can be aware  then he said he had a suspicion, we hugged and it was all cool
